languages.text: {n}Клеменциа пытается сделать шаг в вашу сторону, но стоящий рядом стражник останавливает ее. Лицо женщины покрыто тенью усталости и страха.{/n} "Ваша Светлость!.. Вы здесь. Пожалуйста, выслушайте нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Клеменциа пытается сделать шаг в вашу сторону, но стоящий рядом стражник останавливает ее. Лицо женщины покрыто тенью усталости и страха.{/n} "Ваша Светлость!.. Вы здесь. Это дает мне надежду... Пожалуйста, выслушайте нас".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа пытается сделать шаг в вашу сторону, но стоящий рядом стражник останавливает ее. Лицо женщины покрыто тенью усталости и страха.{/n} "Ваша Светлость!.. Вы здесь. Пожалуйста, выслушайте нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the guard nearby stops her. On her face is a veil of fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here... Please, hear us out."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the guard nearby stops her. On her face is a veil of fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here... Please, hear us out."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアはあなたへと一歩踏み出そうとするが、それを近くのワーデンが静止する。クレメンティアの顔は恐怖と疲労のヴェールで覆われている。{/n}「陛下！こちらでしたのね。どうか、話を聞いていただけないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアはあなたへと一歩踏み出そうとするが、それを近くのワーデンが静止する。クレメンティアの顔は恐怖と疲労のヴェールで覆われている。{/n}「陛下！こちらでしたのね。どうか、話を聞いていただけないでしょうか」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅试图走近你，但她身旁的卫兵立刻阻止了她。她的脸上写满了恐惧与疲惫。{/n}“大人！您终于来了。拜托了，请听听我们的话吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅试图走近你，但她身旁的卫兵立刻阻止了她。她的脸上写满了恐惧与疲惫。{/n}“大人！您终于来了。拜托了，请听我们说吧。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: {n}Clémentia tente de faire un pas dans votre direction, mais un garde la retient. Vous ne sauriez dire si c'est la fatigue ou la peur qui domine sur les traits tirés de son visage.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Vous voilà ! Je vous en supplie, écoutez-nous ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clémentia tente de faire un pas dans votre direction, mais un garde la retient. Vous ne sauriez dire si c'est la fatigue ou la peur qui domine dans les traits tirés de son visage.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Vous voilà ! Je vous en supplie, écoutez-nous ! »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: {n}Clementia intenta dar un paso hacia ti pero un guarda la detiene. El miedo y el cansancio ensombrecen su rostro.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Está aquí. Tiene que escucharnos, por favor».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia intenta dar un paso hacia ti pero un guarda la detiene. En su rostro se puede ver el miedo y el cansancio.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Está aquí. Escúchenos, por favor».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: {n}Clementia versucht, einen Schritt auf dich zuzumachen, doch die Wache neben ihr hält sie auf. Über ihrem Gesicht liegt ein Schleier aus Angst und Erschöpfung.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ihr seid hier. Bitte, Ihr müsst uns anhören."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia versucht, einen Schritt auf dich zuzumachen, doch die Wache neben ihr hält sie auf. Über ihrem Gesicht liegt ein Schleier aus Angst und Erschöpfung.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ihr seid hier. Bitte hört uns an."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: {n}Clementia sana yaklaşmaya çalışıyor ama yanındaki dizdar ona mani oluyor. Yüzünden korku ve endişe okunuyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Teşrif ettiniz. Yalvarırım, bizi bir dinleyin."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia tries to take a step toward you, but the warden nearby stops her. Her face is veiled with fear and weariness.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! You are here. Please, you must hear us out."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia sana yaklaşmaya çalışıyor ama yanındaki dizdar ona mani oluyor. Yüzünden korku ve endişe okunuyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Teşrif ettiniz. Yalvarırım, bizi bir dinleyin."
traits.speaker: Clemence
